author: Opinion by Dr. Shahdabul Faraz
title: Health care workers face a mental health crisis as they battle the coronavirus pandemic
description: While the toll on our health care system and economy are widely discussed, we have been far too quiet  about another, more insidious, problem, writes Shahdabul Faraz
content: Dr. Shahdabul Faraz is a resident physician in the Department of Surgery at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, a teaching hospital of Harvard Medical School, and an incoming MBA candidate at Harvard Business School. The views expressed in this commentary b… [+7365 chars]
